column11: This cult favorite solid balm removes the kind of stubborn makeup that tends to trail behind. It doesn’t contain any irritants so most people will have no issue rubbing it gently all over their eyes and lash lines to break down even the most tenacious eye makeup! As a bonus, this method is gentler on your eyes and causes less skin dragging/irritation and lash pulling/fallout than using a cotton pad since your fingers slip around with no friction in the oil. The cherry on top of all of this is that usually with oil cleansers you have to wipe it off with a cloth to remove all the oil from your face. However, this balm includes surfactants that mean it rinses right off when you add water, removing almost all of the makeup/residue from your face and leaving the it ready for a more targeted skin cleanse! It is perfect for most skin types, but especially dry and sensitive types will benefit from this more gentle form of cleansing.
